10044 photos (at the time of this post; 2000 or so of which are private) in Flickr in just over a year! I get a lot of flack about not editing my photos since all I do is delete blurry ones (except for the Hugin And Mugin photos where the blurry photos are an artifact of today's limited cameraphones and slow network). Well, my response is that I am recording my life!

I am not a photographer nor do I plan on becoming one. The photo you dislike or think is superfluous is valuable context for me and/or has sentimental value. And I am saving it on flickr because it (no longer Blogware, sorry) is the best place to store and retrieve photos on the Internet.
